verses.verse: וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּשְׁכָּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan the tabernacle תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh Moreover thou shalt make עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser [with] ten יְרִיעֹ֑ת <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot; curtains שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar, [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֤לֶת <S%H8504><s%> u-te-Che-let and blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni, and scarlet כְּרֻבִ֛ים <S%H3742><s%> ke-ru-Vim [with] cherubims מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> cho-Shev of cunning תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

אֹ֣רֶךְ׀ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat, of one שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh [shall be] eight וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat; of one מִדָּ֥ה <S%H4060><s%> mid-Dah measure אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat shall have one לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃ <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot. and every one of the curtains

חֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh The five הַיְרִיעֹ֗ת <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot, curtains תִּֽהְיֶ֙יןָ֙ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-na become חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <S%H2266><s%> choe-Rot, shall be coupled together אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tah; to another וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and [other] five יְרִיעֹת֙ <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot curtains חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <S%H2266><s%> choe-Rot, [shall be] coupled אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tah. to another

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת <S%H3924><s%> lul-'Ot loops תְּכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let, of blue עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on שְׂפַ֤ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat upon the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat, of the one מִקָּצָ֖ה <S%H7098><s%> mik-ka-Tzah from the selvedge בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <S%H2279><s%> ba-cho-Va-ret; in the coupling וְכֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen and likewise תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh and likewise shalt thou make בִּשְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> bis-Fat edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah, of [another] curtain הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7020><s%> hak-Ki-tzo-Nah, in the uttermost בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת <S%H4225><s%> bam-mach-Be-ret in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit. of the second

חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim Fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> lu-la-'Ot, loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> bay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָת֒ <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat in the one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> lu-la-'Ot, loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> bik-Tzeh in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah, of the curtain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת <S%H4225><s%> bam-mach-Be-ret that [is] in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit; of the second מַקְבִּילֹת֙ <S%H6901><s%> mak-bi-Lot may take hold הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <S%H3924><s%> hal-Lu-la-'Ot, that the loops אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tah. of another

וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty קַרְסֵ֣י <S%H7165><s%> kar-Sei taches זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav; of gold וְחִבַּרְתָּ֨ <S%H2266><s%> ve-chib-bar-Ta and couple אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְרִיעֹ֜ת <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot the curtains אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah to one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֲחֹתָהּ֙ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tah with בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים <S%H7165><s%> bak-ke-ra-Sim, the taches וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan tabernacle אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. and it shall be one פ Peh

וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make יְרִיעֹ֣ת <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot curtains עִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim, [of] goats' לְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> le-'O-hel [hair] to be a covering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan; upon the tabernacle עַשְׁתֵּי־ <S%H6249><s%> 'ash-tei- eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten יְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot curtains תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

אֹ֣רֶךְ׀ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat, of one שְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim [shall be] thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat; of one מִדָּ֣ה <S%H4060><s%> mid-Dah measure אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat, [shall be all] of one לְעַשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H6249><s%> le-'ash-Tei eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten יְרִיעֹֽת׃ <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot. curtains

וְחִבַּרְתָּ֞ <S%H2266><s%> ve-chib-bar-Ta And thou shalt couple אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh five הַיְרִיעֹת֙ <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot curtains לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad, themselves וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh by themselves and six הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot curtains לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad; themselves וְכָפַלְתָּ֙ <S%H3717><s%> ve-cha-fal-Ta by themselves and shalt double אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔ית <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shit, the sixth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מ֖וּל <S%H4136><s%> mul against פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the front הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel. of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> lu-la-'Ot, loops עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on שְׂפַ֤ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat on the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat, of the one הַקִּיצֹנָ֖ה <S%H7020><s%> hak-ki-tzo-Nah [that is] outmost בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <S%H2279><s%> ba-cho-Va-ret; in the coupling וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> lu-la-'Ot, loops עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah, of the curtain הַחֹבֶ֖רֶת <S%H2279><s%> ha-cho-Ve-ret which coupleth הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit. the second

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make קַרְסֵ֥י <S%H7165><s%> kar-Sei taches נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet of brass חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim; fifty וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ta and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקְּרָסִים֙ <S%H7165><s%> hak-ke-ra-Sim the taches בַּלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <S%H3924><s%> bal-Lu-la-'Ot, into the loops וְחִבַּרְתָּ֥ <S%H2266><s%> ve-chib-bar-Ta and couple אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel the tent וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will be a אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. together that it may be one

וְסֶ֙רַח֙ <S%H5629><s%> ve-Se-rach And the remnant הָעֹדֵ֔ף <S%H5736><s%> ha-'o-Def, that remaineth בִּירִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> bi-ri-'Ot of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel; of the tent חֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi the half הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָעֹדֶ֔פֶת <S%H5736><s%> ha-'o-De-fet, that remaineth תִּסְרַ֕ח <S%H5628><s%> tis-Rach shall hang עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over אֲחֹרֵ֥י <S%H268><s%> 'a-cho-Rei over the backside הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan. of the tabernacle

וְהָאַמָּ֨ה <S%H520><s%> ve-ha-'am-Mah And a cubit מִזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh on the one side וְהָאַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> ve-ha-'am-Mah and a cubit מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh side בָּעֹדֵ֔ף <S%H5736><s%> ba-'o-Def, on the other side of that which remaineth בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> be-'O-rech in the length יְרִיעֹ֣ת <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel; of the tent יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become סָר֜וּחַ <S%H5628><s%> sa-Ru-ach it shall hang עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over צִדֵּ֧י <S%H6654><s%> tzid-Dei over the sides הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle מִזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh the other וּמִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> u-miz-Zeh one לְכַסֹּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3680><s%> le-chas-so-To. on this side and on that side to cover

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make מִכְסֶה֙ <S%H4372><s%> mich-Seh a covering לָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> la-'O-hel, for the tent עֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> 'o-Rot skins אֵילִ֖ם <S%H352><s%> 'ei-Lim [of] rams' מְאָדָּמִ֑ים <S%H119><s%> me-'ad-da-Mim; dyed red וּמִכְסֵ֛ה <S%H4372><s%> u-mich-Seh and a covering עֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> 'o-Rot skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8476><s%> te-cha-Shim [of] badgers' מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah. above פ Peh

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H7175><s%> hak-ke-ra-Shim boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> lam-mish-Kan; for the tabernacle עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim [of] shittim עֹמְדִֽים׃ <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim. standing up

עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser Ten אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech [shall be] the length הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> hak-Ka-resh; of a board וְאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> ve-'am-Mah and a cubit וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and a half הָֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ha-'am-Mah, cubits רֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav [shall be] the breadth הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> hak-Ke-resh board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad. of one

שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei Two יָד֗וֹת <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dot, tenons לַקֶּ֙רֶשׁ֙ <S%H7175><s%> lak-Ke-resh board הָאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad, [shall there be] in one מְשֻׁלָּבֹ֔ת <S%H7947><s%> me-shul-la-Vot, set in order אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tah; against another כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken thus תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh, thus shalt thou make לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol for all קַרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H7175><s%> kar-Shei for all the boards הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan. of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H7175><s%> hak-ke-ra-Shim the boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> lam-mish-Kan; for the tabernacle עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty קֶ֔רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> Ke-resh, boards לִפְאַ֖ת <S%H6285><s%> lif-'At side נֶ֥גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah on the south תֵימָֽנָה׃ <S%H8486><s%> tei-Ma-nah. southward

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make לַמָּסָ֗ךְ <S%H4539><s%> lam-ma-Sach, for the hanging חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five עַמּוּדֵ֣י <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-Dei pillars שִׁטִּ֔ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim, [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֤ <S%H6823><s%> ve-tzip-pi-Ta [wood] and overlay אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, them with gold וָוֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2053><s%> va-vei-Hem [and] their hooks זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav; [shall be of] gold וְיָצַקְתָּ֣ <S%H3332><s%> ve-ya-tzak-Ta and thou shalt cast לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five אַדְנֵ֥י <S%H134><s%> 'ad-Nei sockets נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. of brass ס sa-Mek
